project1.title: blog
project1.description: 我也曾豪情万丈闯荡大都市，奈何苦于无识才伯乐，一身才华无处施展，遂激起逆反心，对于一些低技能的工作，总是可以完美地不做到位，以至于到最后没有人愿意再给我工作机会。只能吃着国家低保，靠着国家帮扶照顾，算衣食无忧，勉强度日，感谢祖国，感谢党。.

project2.title: Issue Tracker
project2.description: Issue Tracker is a TypeScript-based web application built with Next.js and Prisma. It features seamless issue tracking, user authentication, and responsive design for versatile usability.

project3.title: Chat App
project3.description: ChatApp is a from-scratch, open-source Django full-stack application. It facilitates account creation, profile updates, random chat room participation, online user visibility, and private messaging capabilities etc.

project4.title: Custom Tree
project4.description: This project is for getting a beautiful custom tree of your project. I'm gonna update it more adding structuring and much more.

project5.title: ftms-backend
project5.description: Revolutionize football tournaments with our intuitive system. Seamlessly create, manage, and monitor competitions with React and Tailwind CSS frontend, backed by Django API. Effortlessly organize teams, schedule matches, and track tournament history with ease still in progress.

project6.title: ftms-frontend
project6.description: This is the frontend of ftms-backend(Football Tournament Management System)
